jobs.title: Investment Banker
jobs.descriptionHtml:
OffDeal is the world’s first AI-native investment bank for small businesses. Instead of selling AI to Goldman Sachs, we’re building what Goldman itself would have looked like if it launched in 2025.

Wall Street's playbook works well, but only for billion-dollar deals - it breaks where most businesses actually exist. Traditional firms run oversized teams on outdated software, making smaller M&A transactions uneconomical. This leaves millions of small business owners with nowhere to turn for the most important sale of their lives… Until now.

Our engineers built software to automate 80%+ of analyst work with AI, so our in-house bankers can focus where it counts - on earning owners’ trust and closing deals.

We recently closed a $12M Series A ($17M in total funding) from Radical Ventures and Y Combinator and are scaling really fast. In less than a year, our team has already launched over 30 sell-side M&A transactions and has delivered numerous life-changing exits to our clients - and we’re just getting started.

Read more about our story:

  • https://www.ft.com/content/9daf5c7e-e301-4b7d-809a-ff9fb336bdbc

  • https://www.cnbc.com/video/2025/08/04/wall-streets-new-ai-era-offdeal-ceo-on-using-ai-to-disrupt-investment-banking.html

  • https://www.fullydistributed.co/p/the-bull-case-for-an-ai-native-investment

The Role

As an Investment Banker at OffDeal, you’ll focus on what matters most: earning owners’ trust and closing deals. Unlike traditional roles where 70 % of time is spent prospecting and creating documents, our AI does the heavy lifting. You step in once qualified owners are engaged - enabling you to work on 20-30 deals per year versus the industry norm of 3-5.

What You'll Do

  • High-Value Advisory: Build rapport with owners, provide strategic guidance, and structure optimal deals while AI drafts the core materials.

  • Efficient Deal Execution: Operate in a two-person pod: a dedicated BD banker fills your pipeline with pre-qualified sellers and you do the closing.

  • AI-Enhanced Deal Preparation: Refine AI-generated teasers, CIMs, and buyer lists; weeks of work collapse into hours.

  • Product Innovation: Feed real-time feedback to engineers and help shape the future of tech-enabled M&A.

A typical month as an OffDeal Investment Banker:

  • Engage with 50-100 qualified business owners

  • Manage 5-10 active sell-side mandates

  • Close 1-2 deals

Who We’re Looking For

  • M&A Experience: 2-4+ years in investment banking or private equity from a top firm

  • Financial Acumen: Strong financial literacy (statements, multiples, diligence flows)

  • Communication & Empathy: Elite communicator who can translate complexity for first-time sellers

  • Entrepreneurial Spirit: Self-starter who excels in a fast-moving, ambiguous environment.

  • Educational Background: Bachelor’s in Finance, Business, Economics, or related field

Why Join OffDeal

  • OffDeal is growing exceptionally fast and is a leader in AI-enabled services—deal volume is compounding every quarter

  • Top-tier benefits, including medical, dental, vision, and unlimited PTO

  • 401K Matching

  • Perks like free food, Equinox membership, and NYC relocation allowance

  • Opportunity to be a foundational team member at a well-funded, high-growth startup

  • Be part of a mission to shape the future of small business ownership and to promote American entrepreneurship

If you’re an ambitious early- or mid-career finance pro who’d rather shape the future of deal making than polish logos in Appendix K, let’s talk.

jobs.title: Executive Assistant
jobs.descriptionHtml:
OffDeal is the world’s first AI-native investment bank for small businesses. Instead of selling AI to Goldman Sachs, we’re building what Goldman itself would have looked like if it launched in 2025.

Wall Street's playbook works well, but only for billion-dollar deals - it breaks where most businesses actually exist. Traditional firms run oversized teams on outdated software, making smaller M&A transactions uneconomical. This leaves millions of small business owners with nowhere to turn for the most important sale of their lives… Until now.

Our engineers built software to automate 80%+ of analyst work with AI, so our in-house bankers can focus where it counts - on earning owners’ trust and closing deals.

We recently closed a $12M Series A ($17M in total funding) from Radical Ventures and Y Combinator and are scaling really fast. In less than a year, our team has already launched over 30 sell-side M&A transactions and has delivered numerous life-changing exits to our clients - and we’re just getting started.

Read more about our story:

  • https://www.ft.com/content/9daf5c7e-e301-4b7d-809a-ff9fb336bdbc

  • https://www.cnbc.com/video/2025/08/04/wall-streets-new-ai-era-offdeal-ceo-on-using-ai-to-disrupt-investment-banking.html

  • https://www.fullydistributed.co/p/the-bull-case-for-an-ai-native-investment

The Role

As the Executive Assistant to OffDeal’s founders, you'll be the operational backbone of our growing team, wearing multiple hats to keep our fast-paced startup running smoothly. You'll work directly with the founders to manage everything from executive calendars to company culture, playing a critical role in scaling our operations as we transform the M&A industry.

What You'll Do

  • Manage day-to-day office operations including snacks, lunch logistics, non-technical procurement, and workspace maintenance

  • Support recruiting logistics by scheduling interviews, coordinating travel, and processing payroll for the team

  • Build company culture through team events, offsites, and fostering a positive work environment

  • Handle financial operations including accounts payable, expense auditing, and basic bookkeeping

  • Provide executive support by managing founder calendars, coordinating external events, and purchasing client gifts

We're Looking for Someone Who Has / Is a…

  • 3+ years of experience as an Executive Assistant, Office Manager, or similar role

  • Exceptional organizational skills with the ability to juggle multiple priorities and deadlines

  • Strong communication skills and professional demeanor

  • Self-starter who thrives in ambiguous environments and can build processes from scratch

  • High conscientiousness and meticulous attention to detail, ensuring nothing falls through the cracks

Why Join OffDeal

  • Opportunity to be a foundational team member at a well-funded, high-growth startup

  • Competitive compensation and equity package

  • Top-tier benefits, including medical, dental, vision, and unlimited PTO

  • 401K Matching

  • Perks like free food, Equinox membership, and NYC relocation allowance

  • Work alongside exceptional talent in a collaborative, fast-paced environment

  • Be part of a mission to shape the future of small business ownership and promote American entrepreneurship

jobs.title: Full Stack Engineer (New Grad)
jobs.descriptionHtml:
OffDeal is the world’s first AI-native investment bank for small businesses. Instead of selling AI to Goldman Sachs, we’re building what Goldman itself would have looked like if it launched in 2025.

Wall Street's playbook works well, but only for billion-dollar deals - it breaks where most businesses actually exist. Traditional firms run oversized teams on outdated software, making smaller M&A transactions uneconomical. This leaves millions of small business owners with nowhere to turn for the most important sale of their lives… Until now.

Our engineers built software to automate 80%+ of analyst work with AI, so our in-house bankers can focus where it counts - on earning owners’ trust and closing deals.

We recently closed a $12M Series A ($17M in total funding) from Radical Ventures and Y Combinator and are scaling really fast. In less than a year, our team has already launched over 30 sell-side M&A transactions and has delivered numerous life-changing exits to our clients - and we’re just getting started.

Read more about our story:

  • https://www.ft.com/content/9daf5c7e-e301-4b7d-809a-ff9fb336bdbc

  • https://www.cnbc.com/video/2025/08/04/wall-streets-new-ai-era-offdeal-ceo-on-using-ai-to-disrupt-investment-banking.html

  • https://www.fullydistributed.co/p/the-bull-case-for-an-ai-native-investment

The Role

As a Full Stack Engineer, you'll work directly with the CTO and the investment banking team to build the AI-native platform that empowers our investment bankers to be 10x more productive.

Your work will directly impact how $10 trillion worth of small businesses change hands over the coming decade.

What You'll Do

  • Collaborate with our in-house investment bankers to own 0 to 1 projects, from ideation to deployment

  • Build across the entire stack, in our 100% TypeScript (i.e. ReactJS + NodeJS) codebase

  • Work with the latest AI tech, from on our in-house AI agents to complex recommendation and search algorithms

We’re Looking for Someone Who Has / Is a…

  • Proficiency in TypeScript, React, and Node.js with experience building full-stack applications

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related technical field

  • Previous software engineering experience through internships, co-ops, or professional roles

  • Comfort in ambiguous and unstructured startup work environments

  • Willingness to work in-person at our NYC office, 5 days a week

Why Join OffDeal

  • We only hire best-in-class engineers, and are offering compensation to reflect it

  • Top-tier benefits, including medical, dental, vision, and unlimited PTO

  • Perks like free food, Equinox membership, and NYC relocation allowance

  • Work with bleeding edge AI on a modern codebase

  • Opportunity to be a foundational team member at a well-funded, high-growth startup

  • Be part of a mission to shape the future of small business ownership and to promote American entrepreneurship

jobs.title: Full Stack Engineer
jobs.descriptionHtml:
OffDeal is the world’s first AI-native investment bank for small businesses. Instead of selling AI to Goldman Sachs, we’re building what Goldman itself would have looked like if it launched in 2025.

Wall Street's playbook works well, but only for billion-dollar deals - it breaks where most businesses actually exist. Traditional firms run oversized teams on outdated software, making smaller M&A transactions uneconomical. This leaves millions of small business owners with nowhere to turn for the most important sale of their lives… Until now.

Our engineers built software to automate 80%+ of analyst work with AI, so our in-house bankers can focus where it counts - on earning owners’ trust and closing deals.

We recently closed a $12M Series A ($17M in total funding) from Radical Ventures and Y Combinator and are scaling really fast. In less than a year, our team has already launched over 30 sell-side M&A transactions and has delivered numerous life-changing exits to our clients - and we’re just getting started.

Read more about our story:

  • https://www.ft.com/content/9daf5c7e-e301-4b7d-809a-ff9fb336bdbc

  • https://www.cnbc.com/video/2025/08/04/wall-streets-new-ai-era-offdeal-ceo-on-using-ai-to-disrupt-investment-banking.html

  • https://www.fullydistributed.co/p/the-bull-case-for-an-ai-native-investment

The Role

As a Senior Software Engineer, you'll work directly with the CTO to build the AI-native platform that empowers our investment bankers to be 10x more productive. Your work will directly impact how $10 trillion worth of small businesses change hands over the coming decade.

What You'll Do

  • Collaborate with our in-house investment bankers to own 0 to 1 projects, from ideation to deployment

  • Build across the entire stack, in our 100% TypeScript (i.e. ReactJS + NodeJS) codebase

  • Work with the latest AI tech, from on our in-house AI agents to complex recommendation and search algorithms

We’re Looking for Someone Who Has / Is a…

  • 2+ years of work experience of shipping 0 to 1 products in TypeScript, React, and NodeJS

  • Comfort in ambiguous and unstructured startup work environments

  • Generalist with a love of building across the stack

  • Strong product sense, being able to be their own product manager and designer

Why Join OffDeal

  • We only hire best-in-class engineers, and are offering compensation to reflect it

  • Top-tier benefits, including medical, dental, vision, and unlimited PTO

  • 401K Matching

  • Perks like free food, Equinox membership, and NYC relocation allowance

  • Work with bleeding edge AI on a modern codebase

  • Opportunity to be a foundational team member at a well-funded, high-growth startup

  • Be part of a mission to shape the future of small business ownership and to promote American entrepreneurship
